trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Burlington
There were no other sightings in Burlington on or around April 17th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down Rose Ave. eastbound when i noticed the bright reflection off the object to my northeast. I stared at it as much a i could while driving, noticing it was not moving at all. At first i thought it was a commercial airline, but realized it wasnt moving, left no contrail, and was huge. I alternated between watching the object and the road, and after a minute and a half it wasnt there when i looked back up. I then turned north to try and locate it but there were no aircraft or other objects in the sky. The sky was clear and sunny.
Summary: Large shiney silver elongated object bigger than commercial airliner near powerstation
